evidence.text: the parties stipulate and agree not to contest the jurisdiction of the Court for enforcement purposes and appeal purposes and approval of Class Counsel Fees and Expenses.
On December 15,2016, the Co-Neutrals shall issue a final report.
Each member of the Settlement Class releases the Released Claims against the Released Parties on the date of Final Approval.

extracted.value: Each member of the Settlement Class releases the Released Claims against the Released Parties on the date of Final Approval.

evidence.text: By March 30, 2012 the Department shall submit a child welfare plan ('Plan') to the Co-Neutrals and Class Plaintiffs and provide a copy to counsel for the Group Homes.

extracted.value: By March 30, 2012 the Department shall submit a child welfare plan ('Plan') to the Co-Neutrals and Class Plaintiffs and provide a copy to counsel for the Group Homes.

evidence.text: The Department shall provide reports to the Co-Neutrals and Class Plaintiffs measuring the Department's progress toward the Target Outcomes.

extracted.value: The Department shall provide reports to the Co-Neutrals and Class Plaintiffs measuring the Department's progress toward the Target Outcomes.

evidence.text: Co-Neutrals shall act as arbiters of any dispute between the parties arising out of this Settlement Agreement.

extracted.value: Co-Neutrals shall act as arbiters of any dispute between the parties arising out of this Settlement Agreement.

evidence.text: The Court shall retain limited jurisdiction to enter necessary orders enforcing the Co-Neutrals' decisions as provided for herein.

extracted.value: The Court shall retain limited jurisdiction to enter necessary orders enforcing the Co-Neutrals' decisions as provided for herein.

evidence.text: The Court shall be requested to enter Judgment approving the settlement between Settling Defendant and the Settlement Class.

extracted.value: The Court shall be requested to enter Judgment approving the settlement between Settling Defendant and the Settlement Class.

evidence.text: The Court will dismiss the Class Action Litigation with prejudice.

extracted.value: The Court will dismiss the Class Action Litigation with prejudice.

evidence.text: This Settlement Agreement shall be binding and enforceable against the parties, but it is not a consent decree.

extracted.value: This Settlement Agreement shall be binding and enforceable against the parties, but it is not a consent decree.

evidence.text: The settlement contemplated by this Settlement Agreement is conditioned on the approval of the United States District Court.

extracted.value: The settlement contemplated by this Settlement Agreement is conditioned on the approval of the United States District Court.

evidence.text: Class Counsel Fees and Expenses shall mean reasonable fees and expenses... The Court shall retain jurisdiction to make this determination.

extracted.value: Class Counsel Fees and Expenses shall mean reasonable fees and expenses... The Court shall retain jurisdiction to make this determination.

evidence.text: The Court shall retain limited jurisdiction to enter necessary orders enforcing the Co-Neutrals' decisions as provided for herein.
